title: Schoolgirl Vel'Koz may be wrong...
body:
...but I tried to be like Creator {{champion:112}} and help Vel'Koz with a new Skin Concept.

See, as a Star Guardian he got an enhanced laser with longer range capabilities so he can learn-beam way more creatures than usual.

His armor may be not as good as before but now he catches his enemys by surprise.

replies.body: I fully support Star Guardian skins for every champion in the game. Also, Star Guardian Vel'Koz needs more blush marks. @u@

A red answer o.o In my first thread ever O.O

K I asked Vel'Koz for a portrait and he agreed.

http://i.imgur.com/HO6fgBL.jpg
Yesssssssssssss! <3
We need a Star Guardian Garen. You can't just leave the brother out of the fun.
only {{champion:44}} gets pink armor. nobody else. out of Males, that is
Then we dress the rest of the males in school girl outfits.
you put blush marks on all his eyes omg im done lol
DISINTE---I mean DEMACIA! :D
Star Guardian {{champion:6}} , Riot please.
{{champion:96}} uses ~~Void Ooze~~ vomits puke.
Like Star Guardian {{champion:78}} ? Yes please, but make that after we get to experience a zombie apocalypse.
Every champion with a laser beam!
"I hope senpai notices my tentacles..!"
That depends. Because it seems like some sempais notice tentacles a bit too much.
Usagi pls.
I've watched enough hentai to know where this is going

Um. Yes. 

So, the big question I have is, what is his dance going to be?

Good question, but I think Vel'Koz would be a pro at Get Down o-o

https://31.media.tumblr.com/b9374c45fcd6054f95e85127d6220d14/tumblr_inline_ngfe9qyteo1qjqvcj.gif
Doesn't he already do that if you alternate between dance and laugh rapidly?
How else could I've gotten this idea? :3

Ladies and gentleman, have the boards gone too far?

nah hes armor may be even better.
you know how females gain more armor the more provocative their outfit is.
Lets just say Vel'koz is female :p

Daaayum I didn't {{champion:161}} that.
The unseen invention is the deadliest xD

yea, thats why females in all those anime that have combat, they're wearing like....Nothing.
but still able to tank more damage than the guys in full battle armor and even using a shield.
#Logic.

Females? Armor?
https://33.media.tumblr.com/b698236ac7ea044cbfc62644c23f056b/tumblr_n686131BlO1sxo1yfo1_400.gif
Do you even Kill la Kill? Not even just females.
If Schoolgirl Vel'Koz is wrong, I don't want to be right.
Star Guardian Diana would be amazing.

Popstar works too.
http://33.media.tumblr.com/cdb0ac4a0c63634b79db23b1293b69f9/tumblr_n59obaofdP1tswyxpo1_250.gif

U sir are creepy
this is why we can't have nice things, like Schoolgirl Vel'Koz :/
U sir have no sense of humor, along with 10 other prudes who can't handle a dirty joke.

no, and as someone whos humor consists of mostly dirty and black(as in about death and really horrible things, not the skin color) jokes you did not put across that as a joke at all, if you are going to do a comment like that on a board as a joke, put a /s at the end fro sarcasm or something so everyone can know you are joking
He's the tentacle and the girl in one.
